actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to limit the number of bills and resolutions which any Member may introduce in a Congress.

summary.text: Amends rule XXII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member of the House from introducing more than 20 bills and resolutions during any Congress.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to limit the number of bills and resolutions which any Member may introduce in a Congress.
